header.logout-message: Do you confirm you want to log out of SEND?

tos.title: SEND - Servizio Notifiche Digitali
tos.body: To log in, accept the Terms and Conditions of Service and read the Privacy Policy.
tos.redo-body: The Terms and Conditions of Service and Privacy Policy have changed. To log in, you must agree and confirm that you have read the new versions.
tos.switch-label: I accept the <1>Terms and Conditions of Use</1> and confirm that I have read the <0>Privacy Policy</0>

date-picker.switch-to-year: calendar mode active, switch to year selection mode
date-picker.switch-to-calendar: year selection mode active, switch to calendar mode
date-picker.date-selected: Choose date, the selected date is {{date}}

error-boundary.title: Something went wrong
error-boundary.description: We were unable to load the page. Please reload it, or try again later.

not-accessible.title: Cannot access the platform
not-accessible.description: SEND is currently being tested and is not yet available. For more information about SEND,

access-denied: You do not have the necessary permissions to access this page
not-logged-subtitle: To view and manage your notifications, log in with SPID or CIE.

not-found.title: What you were looking for is not here.
not-found.description: The page you were looking for does not exist or is no longer available.

messages.404-message: An error has occurred. Please try again later
messages.403-message: Enter and log in with SPID or CIE.
messages.401-message: Current user does not have permissions
messages.500-message: Due to a temporary service issue, your request has not been sent. Please come back later.
messages.lacking-grants-for-app-title: You are not authorised to log in
messages.invalid-token-title: You cannot log in due to a technical issue - invalid token
messages.generic-message: An error has occurred. Please try again later
messages.generic-api-error-main-text: We were unable to retrieve this data.

footer.go-to-pagopa: Link: go to the website of PagoPA S.p.A.
footer.personal-data: Right to protection of personal data
footer.social: Link: go to the website {{social}} of PagoPA S.p.A.
footer.legal-part-1: joint stock company with sole shareholder - share capital of 1,000,000 euros fully paid up - registered office in Rome, Piazza Colonna 370
footer.legal-part-2: CAP 00187 - Reg. no. in the Rome Business Register, Fiscal code and VAT number 15376371009

validation.invalid-characters-not-inserted: Invalid characters have not been entered.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorised user
unauthorized.message: The current user does not have permissions.

forbidden.title: Your session has timed out
forbidden.message: Enter and log in with SPID or CIE.

not_found.title: Resource not found
not_found.message: An error has occurred. Please try again later.

internal_server.title: Service not available
internal_server.message: Due to a temporary service issue, your request has not been sent. Please come back later.

unhandled.title: Generic error
unhandled.message: An error has occurred. Please try again later.

invalid_type_code.title: This field only accepts numeric values
invalid_type_code.message: Check the verification code and enter it again

empty_code.title: Missing or incomplete code
empty_code.message: The code you entered is incomplete; please enter a 5-digit code.

invalid_body.title: Data is invalid
invalid_body.message: An error occurred while submitting your data. Please check that it is correct, without spaces or special characters, and try again. If the error persists, contact support and provide the error information.

invalid_parameter.title: Invalid data
invalid_parameter.message: One or more of the entered data is invalid

downtime_language_banner.message: The original text of these documents is in Italian. In case of conflict between the Italian version and the translations into other languages, the meaning and conditions of the Italian language shall prevail.

no-spaces-at-edges: Delete spaces at the beginning or end

inactivity.title: Do you really want to log out of SEND?
inactivity.body: The disconnection is in progress. If you have changed your mind, press “Keep access” within a few seconds.
